title: LIKE/IN
content:
LIKE/IN & WildCards
SELECT column_names(s) FROM table_name WHERE column_name LIKE pattern/IN (value1, value2?); 
% = A substitute for zero or more characteristic
_  = A substitute for a single character

LIKE - is used to search for a specified pattern in a column

IN - allows you to specify multiply values in a WHERE clauase
